lead_paragraph: The report of an S.E.C. inquiry follows a Bloomberg article describing an effort by Hampton Creek to buy large quantities of its egg-free mayonnaise.

byline.original: By NICK WINGFIELD and KATIE BENNER

headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Said to Scrutinize the Maker of Just Mayo
headline.main: Hampton Creek, Maker of Just Mayo, Is Said to Be Under Inquiry

snippet: The report of an S.E.C. inquiry follows a Bloomberg article describing an effort by Hampton Creek to buy large quantities of its egg-free mayonnaise....
abstract: Securities and Exchange Commission opens preliminary inquiry into Hampton Creek; move comes in response to report that says prominent start-up attempted to make its Just Mayo mayonnaise product seem more popular by using undercover contractors to buy back big quantities of it from stores.
